title: How to Create a Superhero Movie Trilogy

steps.headline: Create and design unique superheroes and villains first.
steps.description: Don't copy Spider-Man or any other superheros because this isn't very original and if you do happen to strike it really lucky and make a film good enough for the independent film market, you will want something very original to capture peoples' imagination.

steps.headline: Write down the characteristics of your heroes and villains and consider all the things that make them supernatural and other elements:
Plan the trilogy carefully.

tyn: Editing software like iMovie, Final Cut Express, or Adobe Premiere
Visual Effects Software Like Adobe After Effects/Photoshop/Flash
text:
Create and design unique superheroes and villains first. Don't copy Spider-Man or any other superheros because this isn't very original and if you do happen to strike it really lucky and make a film good enough for the independent film market, you will want something very original to capture peoples' imagination. Write down the characteristics of your heroes and villains and consider all the things that make them supernatural and other elements: Create special powers - make sure it isn't as basic as just being able to fly. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/65/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/65/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Consider where they live - on Earth or somewhere else{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cc/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cc/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Will there be one superhero or a group? {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0f/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0f/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Choose names, clothes and special features. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b5/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b5/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Plan the trilogy carefully. On a piece of paper or computer, put together a plan of your trilogy ideas: Start with the first movie. You might wish to make it about the hero getting his or her super powers and having fun with them for a while until the villain shows up. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Second movie. This might be about the hero's personal life (love, money, violence etc.) and a character (villain) interfering with it. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Third movie. In this one, you will probably wish to create a climactic showdown with the toughest and most powerful villain that your superhero has to face. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c8/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c8/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
sentences: Create and design unique superheroes and villains first.

Don't copy Spider-Man or any other superheros because this isn't very original and if you do happen to strike it really lucky and make a film good enough for the independent film market, you will want something very original to capture peoples' imagination.

Write down the characteristics of your heroes and villains and consider all the things that make them supernatural and other elements: Create special powers - make sure it isn't as basic as just being able to fly.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0f\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Choose names, clothes and special features.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b5\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b5\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Plan the trilogy carefully.

On a piece of paper or computer, put together a plan of your trilogy ideas:
Start with the first movie.
You might wish to make it about the hero getting his or her super powers and having fun with them for a while until the villain shows up.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/27\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/27\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Second movie.
This might be about the hero's personal life (love, money, violence etc.)
and a character (villain) interfering with it.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7a\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7a\/Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Create-a-Superhero-Movie-Trilogy-Step-3Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Third movie.
In this one, you will probably wish to create a climactic showdown with the toughest and most powerful villain that your superhero has to face.
